original: Sappītikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasappītiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
analyzed: sa ppītikam dhammam paṭicca na sa ppītikaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā tīṇi

original: Appītikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naappītiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: appītikam dhammam paṭicca na appītikaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Hetuyā nava …pe… purejāte āsevane cha …pe… avigate nava.
analyzed: hetuyā nava pe purejāte āsevane cha pe avigate nava

original: Pītisahagataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca napītisahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
analyzed: pīti sahagatam dhammam paṭicca na pīti sahagataḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā tīṇi

original: Napītisahagataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nanapītisahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na pīti sahagatam dhammam paṭicca na na pīti sahagataḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Hetuyā nava …pe… purejāte āsevane cha …pe… avigate nava.
analyzed: hetuyā nava pe purejāte āsevane cha pe avigate nava

original: Sukhasahagataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasukhasahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
analyzed: sukha sahagatam dhammam paṭicca na sukha sahagataḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā tīṇi

original: Nasukhasahagataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nanasukhasahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na sukha sahagatam dhammam paṭicca na na sukha sahagataḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Hetuyā nava …pe… purejāte āsevane cha …pe… avigate nava.
analyzed: hetuyā nava pe purejāte āsevane cha pe avigate nava

original: Upekkhāsahagataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naupekkhāsahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
analyzed: upekkhā sahagatam dhammam paṭicca na aupekkhā sahagataḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā tīṇi

original: Naupekkhāsahagataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nanaupekkhāsahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na aupekkhā sahagatam dhammam paṭicca na na aupekkhā sahagataḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta

original: Hetuyā nava …pe… purejāte āsevane cha …pe… avigate nava.
analyzed: hetuyā nava pe purejāte āsevane cha pe avigate nava
